languages.text: "Просто вспомните, как после смены возвращаетесь домой, обменяв пайковый талон на чашку супа. С каким аппетитом ваши отпрыски эту чашку заглатывают. Как засыпают, довольные. Ради этого стоит и попахать, и по морде получить!" {n}Улыбчивый. Широкоплечий. С ржавой бородой. Он не боится делиться смехом с другими, и потому с его лица не сходят малиновые тени побоев. Голос яркий и звонкий — такому внимают.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Просто вспомните, как после смены возвращаетесь домой, обменяв пайковый талон на чашку супа. С каким аппетитом ваши отпрыскы эту чашку загладывают. Как засыпают, довольные. Ради этого стоит и попахать, и по морде получить!" {n}Улыбчивый. Широкоплечий. С ржавой бородой. Ты не боишься делится смехом с другими в этом угрюмом месте, и потому с твоего лица не сходят малиновые тени побоев. Голос яркий и звонкий — такому внимают. К такому хочется прислушиваться. И ты говоришь{/n}.

languages.text: "Just remind yourselves how you come home after your shift, having exchanged your ration card for a bowl of soup. How your little ones gulp that bowl down. How they fall asleep, feeling a little better. I say that's worth a hard day's work... and a punch in the face!" {n}He smiles, broad-shouldered, with a rusty beard. He is not afraid to share laughter with others, and so the crimson shades from the beatings never leave his face. His voice is bright, and sonorous, and listened to.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Просто вспомните, как после смены возвращаетесь домой, обменяв пайковый талон на чашку супа. С каким аппетитом ваши отпрыски эту чашку заглатывают. Как засыпают, довольные. Ради этого стоит и попахать, и по морде получить!" {n}Улыбчивый. Широкоплечий. С ржавой бородой. Он не боится делиться смехом с другими, и потому с его лица не сходят малиновые тени побоев. Голос яркий и звонкий — такому внимают.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Just remember how you come home after your shift, having exchanged your ration card for a bowl of soup. How your offspring gulp down that bowl with gusto. How they fall asleep, happy and content. I say it is worth both working hard and getting punched in the face!" {n}Smiling, broad-shouldered, with a rusty beard. He is not afraid to share laughter with others, and so the crimson hues from the beatings never leave his face. His voice is bright and sonorous, and he is listened to.{/n}

languages.text: "Denkt einfach daran, wie Ihr nach der Schicht nach Hause kommt und Eure Rationskarte gegen eine Schale Suppe eingetauscht habt. Wie Eure Kinder die Schale leeren. Wie sie einschlafen, sich ein wenig besser fühlen. Ich sage, das ist einen Tag harter Arbeit wert ... und einen Schlag ins Gesicht!" {n}Der Mann mit den breiten Schultern und dem roten Bart grinst. Er hat keine Angst, gemeinsam mit anderen zu lachen, und so schwindet die Rotfärbung der Prügel nie ganz aus seinem Gesicht. Seine Stimme ist klar und sonor und wird gehört.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Just remind yourselves how you come home after your shift, having exchanged your ration card for a bowl of soup. How your little ones gulp that bowl down. How they fall asleep, feeling a little better. I say that's worth a hard day's work... and a punch in the face!" {n}He smiles, broad-shouldered, with a rusty beard. He is not afraid to share laughter with others, and so the crimson shades from the beatings never leave his face. His voice is bright, and sonorous, and listened to.{/n}

Er hat keine Angst, gemeinsam mit anderen zu lachen, und so schwindet die Rotfärbung der Prügel nie ganz aus seinem Gesicht. Seine Stimme ist klar und sonor und wird gehört.{/n}

languages.text: «Pensad en el momento en que volvéis a casa después del turno, con un bol de sopa a cambio de vuestra tarjeta de racionamiento. En cómo disfrutan de la comida los pequeñines. En cómo se quedan dormiditos, sintiéndose un poco mejor. Yo diría que eso vale un día de trabajo duro... ¡y un puñetazo en la cara!». {n}El hombre de hombros anchos y barba oxidada sonríe. No teme compartir su risa con los demás, por lo que las sombras carmesíes de los golpes nunca desaparecen de su rostro. Su voz es alegre, sonora y escuchada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Just remind yourselves how you come home after your shift, having exchanged your ration card for a bowl of soup. How your little ones gulp that bowl down. How they fall asleep, feeling a little better. I say that's worth a hard day's work... and a punch in the face!" {n}He smiles, broad-shouldered, with a rusty beard. He is not afraid to share laughter with others, and so the crimson shades from the beatings never leave his face. His voice is bright, and sonorous, and listened to.{/n}

En cómo se quedan dormiditos, sintiéndose un poco mejor. Yo diría que eso vale un día de trabajo duro... ¡y un puñetazo en la cara!». {n}El hombre de hombros anchos y barba oxidada sonríe. No teme compartir su risa con los demás, por lo que las sombras carmesíes de los golpes nunca desaparecen de su rostro. Su voz es alegre, sonora y escuchada.{/n}

languages.text: 「シフトを終え、配給カードとスープを交換して家に帰った時のことを思い出してみてほしい。小さな子供がそのスープを飲み干すのを。少し元気になった子供たちが眠りにつくところを。一日頑張った甲斐があったと言うだろう…顔を殴られてたとしても！」{n}彼は笑う。肩幅が広く、錆色のひげを蓄えている。彼は他人と笑い合うことを恐れないため、殴られたことによる顔のアザが顔から消えることはない。彼の声は明るく、朗々としており耳を傾けたくなる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Just remind yourselves how you come home after your shift, having exchanged your ration card for a bowl of soup. How your little ones gulp that bowl down. How they fall asleep, feeling a little better. I say that's worth a hard day's work... and a punch in the face!" {n}He smiles, broad-shouldered, with a rusty beard. He is not afraid to share laughter with others, and so the crimson shades from the beatings never leave his face. His voice is bright, and sonorous, and listened to.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「シフトを終え、配給カードとスープを交換して家に帰った時のことを思い出してみてほしい。小さな子供がそのスープを飲み干すのを。少し元気になった子供たちが眠りにつくところを。一日頑張った甲斐があったと言うだろう…顔を殴られてたとしても！」{n}彼は笑う。肩幅が広く、錆色のひげを蓄えている。彼は他人と笑い合うことを恐れないため、殴られたことによる顔のアザが顔から消えることはない。彼の声は明るく、朗々としており耳を傾けたくなる。{/n}

languages.text: “这种时候，仔细想想下班之后的样子吧。想想你是怎么用配给卡换了碗汤，回到家里的。想想你那些小家伙都是怎么狼吞虎咽，怎么老老实实睡着的，这样心里就舒服点了。辛辛苦苦干一天活……脸上还挨了一拳，但要我说，看到这一切，就都值了。”{n}他微笑起来。他长着宽阔的肩膀和锈色的胡子，他从不惧怕与别人分享快乐，因此他脸上也始终都会挂着挨打留下的血痕。他的声音明亮而铿锵，周围人都愿意听他说话。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Just remind yourselves how you come home after your shift, having exchanged your ration card for a bowl of soup. How your little ones gulp that bowl down. How they fall asleep, feeling a little better. I say that's worth a hard day's work... and a punch in the face!" {n}He smiles, broad-shouldered, with a rusty beard. He is not afraid to share laughter with others, and so the crimson shades from the beatings never leave his face. His voice is bright, and sonorous, and listened to.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这种时候，仔细想想下班之后的样子吧。想想你是怎么用配给卡换了碗汤，回到家里的。想想你那些小家伙都是怎么狼吞虎咽，怎么老老实实睡着的，这样心里就舒服点了。辛辛苦苦干一天活……脸上还挨了一拳，但要我说，看到这一切，就都值了。”{n}他微笑起来。他长着宽阔的肩膀和锈色的胡子，他从不惧怕与别人分享快乐，因此他脸上也始终都会挂着挨打留下的血痕。他的声音明亮而铿锵，周围人都愿意听他说话。{/n}

languages.text: « Pensez à l'état dans lequel vous êtes quand vous rentrez chez vous après avoir échangé votre ticket de rationnement contre un bol de soupe. À l'avidité avec laquelle vos enfants engloutissent ce bol. À la façon dont ils finissent par s'endormir avec le sentiment d'avoir le ventre plein. Moi, je dis que ça vaut une dure journée de labeur... et un coup de poing dans la figure ! » {n}L'homme aux larges épaules et à la barbe couleur rouille affiche un grand sourire. Comme en attestent les marques écarlates qui strient son visage, preuve qu'il est régulièrement battu, il n'a pas peur de rire avec les autres. Il parle d'une voix claire et sonore, et tout le monde l'écoute.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Just remind yourselves how you come home after your shift, having exchanged your ration card for a bowl of soup. How your little ones gulp that bowl down. How they fall asleep, feeling a little better. I say that's worth a hard day's work... and a punch in the face!" {n}He smiles, broad-shouldered, with a rusty beard. He is not afraid to share laughter with others, and so the crimson shades from the beatings never leave his face. His voice is bright, and sonorous, and listened to.{/n}

Moi, je dis que ça vaut une dure journée de labeur... et un coup de poing dans la figure ! » {n}L'homme aux larges épaules et à la barbe couleur rouille affiche un grand sourire. Comme en attestent les marques écarlates qui strient son visage, preuve qu'il est régulièrement battu, il n'a pas peur de rire avec les autres. Il parle d'une voix claire et sonore, et tout le monde l'écoute.{/n}

languages.text: "Vardiyanızdan sonra eve nasıl döndüğünüzü, bir kâse çorba için kumanya kartınızı verdiğinizi kendinize hatırlatın. Ufaklıkların o kâseyi nasıl yudumladığını, biraz daha iyi hissederek nasıl uykuya daldığını hatırlayın. Bence bu, zorlu bir iş gününe ve... Ağzınızın ortasına yediğiniz bir yumruğa değer!" {n}Gülümsüyor. Geniş omuzlarına leş gibi sakalı eşlik ediyor. Diğerleriyle birlikte gülmekten korkmuyor. Bundandır ki yediği dayakların kızıl tonları, yüzünden hiç eksik olmuyor. Sesi umut dolu, gür ve otoriter.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Just remind yourselves how you come home after your shift, having exchanged your ration card for a bowl of soup. How your little ones gulp that bowl down. How they fall asleep, feeling a little better. I say that's worth a hard day's work... and a punch in the face!" {n}He smiles, broad-shouldered, with a rusty beard. He is not afraid to share laughter with others, and so the crimson shades from the beatings never leave his face. His voice is bright, and sonorous, and listened to.{/n}
